classFeatures.name: Arcane Sense
classFeatures.description: You can sense the presence of magical people and objects when you're close to them.

classFeatures.name: Minor Illusion
classFeatures.description: Make a Spellcast Roll (10). On a success, you create a minor visual illusion no larger than yourself within close range that is convincing to anyone in far range or further.

classFeatures.name: Channel Raw Power
classFeatures.description:
Once per Long Rest, you can place a Domain card from your Loadout into your Vault and choose to either:

- Gain Hope equal to the level of the card.

- Add magic damage equal to twice the level of the card to a spell attack you've successfully cast.

backgroundQuestions: What did you do that make the people in your community wary of you?
Who finally taught you how to control the magic bursting forth from you, and why are they no longer able to guide you?
You have a true fear you hide from everyone. What is it, and why does it scare you?
connectionQuestions: Why do you trust me so deeply?
What did I do that makes you wary of me?
Why do we keep our shared past a secret?
